profile.name: Trần Công Mạnh
profile.bio: Passionate backend developer with a strong systems mindset and a focus on performance. I enjoy building stable, scalable, and efficient applications. Specializing in backend development, databases, and infrastructure, I strive to create seamless experiences for both users and systems.

careerGoals.title: Career Goals
careerGoals.description: I'm focused on mastering modern web technologies and growing into a senior frontend role. I aim to contribute to open source projects, mentor junior developers, and eventually lead development teams building products that make a positive impact.
goals: Become a senior backend developer within the next 5 years
Master the Spring ecosystem and related technologies
Contribute to major open source projects
Build and launch my own product

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I've developed expertise in various technologies, with a focus on creating responsive and accessible web applications.

timeline.title: Experience Timeline
timeline.description: My professional journey and the companies I've worked with.

items.title: Senior Backend Developer
items.description: Leading the backend team in developing and maintaining microservices architecture for enterprise solutions.

items.title: Backend Developer
items.description: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and database schemas for data-intensive applications.

items.title: Junior Developer
items.description: Worked on full-stack development with a focus on backend services and database optimizations.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each one has helped me grow as a developer.

items.title: E-commerce Platform
items.description: A full-featured online shopping platform with product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout functionality.

items.title: Task Management App
items.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality and team collaboration features.

items.title: Weather Dashboard
items.description: A responsive weather application that provides real-time weather data and forecasts for cities worldwide.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate, have questions, or just want to say hi!
